Hero.hero-text: specializes in supplying chemicals and packaging solutions for manufacturers. Since 2017, we have been committed to delivering high-quality raw materials and tailored export services, supporting industries with professionalism and expertise. By staying dedicated to our core areas of operation, we build long-term partnerships and provide innovative solutions that meet the evolving needs of our clients.

Footer.footer-text: Senagat Trade is a business specializing in the supply of raw materials and packaging products to manufacturing industries. They position themselves as a reliable partner with a focus on building trust and long-term partnerships with clients.

About.title: Senagat Trade â€“ Your Trusted Partner in Raw Material Supply
About.text: Established in 2017, Senagat Trade initially focused on supplying specialized packaging materials before expanding its portfolio to include diverse chemicals by 2019. A pivotal step in 2021 was the launch of stock sales from our Ashgabat warehouse, making us a key supplier of essential chemicals like Caustic Soda Flakes for the manufacturing sector. Today, we offer a comprehensive raw materials portfolio, emphasizing chemicals for household goods, complemented by tailored packaging solutions. Our future vision involves leveraging this expertise to venture into manufacturing with a new partner, aiming to launch our own products and solidify our position as a trusted, full-spectrum partner in the domestic and international supply chain.

Contacts.title: Contact us
Contacts.text: Feel free to contact us at any time. We'll get back to you as soon as possible!
